scripts.setup-dotnet: echo 'Run this command to add dotnet to PATH:' && echo 'export PATH=$PATH:$HOME/.dotnet:$HOME/.dotnet/tools'
scripts.start: npm run fable:worker && dotnet fable watch src/FundingSolver.fsproj -o dist -e .jsx --run vite --base=/
scripts.build: npm run fable:worker && dotnet fable src/FundingSolver.fsproj -o dist -e .jsx --noCache --run vite build
